snippet.title: Breachway - Release Date Trailer | Roguelike Deckbuilder Game
snippet.description:
Assemble your crew and explore the galaxy in this deck-building space roguelike when Brechway launces into early access August 30th 2024. 

Your deck is determined by your spaceship's loadout; mix and match equipment to discover different powerful card synergies, and obliterate your enemies in tactical space battles. 

WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2118810/Breachway/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/breachway
EPIC: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/breachway-aa1bbf

Check out all Hooded Horse strategy games:
➤ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/HoodedHorse

Follow us on social media:
➤ Discord: https://discord.gg/hoodedhorse 
➤ Twitter: https://twitter.com/HoodedHorseInc
➤ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HoodedHorse/

https://www.youtube.com/HoodedHorse
